<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Bulk delete verifications"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/assets/verifications/ids/delete"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Deletes multiple asset verification records by their IDs. Use this for bulk cleanup of erroneous or duplicate verifications.

**Workflow Example**
1. Query verifications to identify records for deletion.
2. Collect `AssetVerificationId` values.
3. [DELETE /api/v1.0/assets/verifications/ids/delete](/docs/api/assets/bulk-delete-asset-verifications) with ID array.

**Minimal Required Fields**: array of AssetVerificationId UUIDs in body.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Verifications deleted successfully","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Response envelope returned after successfully deleting multiple resources in bulk. Based on C# `ListDeleteResponse` from `Spark.Shared.Models.Responses`.","properties":{"Ids":{"type":"array","description":"Array of UUIDs for the deleted resources","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}},"UserToken":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Authenticated session identifier"},"RequestDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Timestamp when the API processed the request"},"ExecutionTime":{"type":"number","format":"double","description":"Server-side execution time in milliseconds"},"StatusCode":{"type":"integer","description":"HTTP status code (typically 200 for successful delete)","example":200},"Message":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Optional informational message"},"ServerName":{"type":"string","description":"Application node that processed the request"},"ProcessId":{"type":"integer","description":"Internal process identifier for diagnostics"},"OperationId":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Trace identifier for log correlation"}},"required":["StatusCode"],"title":"ListDeleteResponse"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
>
